title: Barry.Wang Men Dress Shirts Paisley 70s Disco Shirt Button Down Silk Long Sleeve Tops for Wedding/Prom/Party/Nightclub
description: Top Quality: 80% Silk and 20%polyester with Heavy Industry Jacquard Craft, Ensuring a luxurious texture while also incorporating comfort and breathability.
Update Design: The new product's jacquard craftsmanship has been upgraded from 1400 Stitches to 2377 Stitches, combining lifelike clusters with glossy silk to create a perfect charm unique to men.

Occasion: Heavy-silk woven paisley shirts are perfect for Holiday/Wedding/Prom/Party/Business/Night club, and It is a sweet gifts for men as Valentine's Day, Father's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas,New Year or birthday.

Warm Tips: Easy to care.Suggest dry cleaning. Hand washing and machine washing are also acceptable. Silk shirts should avoid snagging. Please use gentle machine washing and use a protective bag. It is recommended to wash dark and light colored clothes separately.
Barry Wang: You can always trust Barry.Wang. Any question, please just contact with us. Satisfying you is our ultimate pursuit.
